info.name: Softdesk API collections
info.description:
``` markdown
This API allows you to view, create, edit, and delete projects, issues, and comments. This API respects the OWASP top 10 and requires registration and identification

```

item.name: AUTH

request.description:
StartFragment

```
User registration (params: email, password, first_name, last_name)
```

EndFragment

response.name: User Signup status 201 output
User Signup error already created output

request.description:
StartFragment

```
User login (params: email, password ; return: token(default expiration time: 5 minutes), refresh(default expiration time: 24 hours))
For the endpoints of the other categories (USER, PROJECT, ISSUE and COMMENT) you will need to fill in the header Key: AUTHORIZED; Value: Bearer access. Where the access is the token (code delivered)

```

EndFragment

response.name: User Login status 200 output
User Login error email or password output

request.description:
StartFragment

```
Refresh token (params: refresh), 

```

```
After 5 minutes, your token will be expired. It is then necessary to generate a new one thanks to the refresh
```

EndFragment

response.name: User Refresh Token status 200 output
User Refresh Token wrong refresh token status 401 output

item.description:
StartFragment

Register, login and token management (token creation and refresh token).

EndFragment

formdata.value: First issue for our exemple project

request.description:
StartFragment

```
Create an issue in a project (params: title, desc, priority[LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH], tag[BUG, IMPROVEMENT, TASK],status[TODO, WIP, DONE], email_assignee)
```

EndFragment
